yep, this is about plans for upcoming discussions, which will be held 
annually:

1 month of discussion about changes to the existing game, not 
including character class changes

1 month of discussion about existing character classes, with one week 
devoted to the summoned/natural character classes (faeries, fire 
elementals, ghosts, and skeletons)

1 month of discussion about the proposed dual class/hybrid character 
classes

1 month of discussion about all other proposed new classes, with one 
week or so devoted to character classes which are promotions of 
exisiting character classes

1 month of discussion about things we'd like to have in the final 
version of Gladiator:Beyond Freedom

1 month or so of a Gladiator Tournament

Rest of the year: getting the 50 project completed

questions/comments/complaints
